meanings.sent1: The factory had various machineries to help with production.
meanings.sent2: The machineries in the workshop were well-maintained.
meanings.sent3: The machineries seemed to have a mind of their own, working tirelessly day and night.
meanings.sent4: The machineries hummed in harmony, creating a symphony of productivity.
meanings.sent5: The massive machineries loomed like giants in the manufacturing plant.

meanings.definition: The working parts of a machine.
meanings.sent1: It's important to regularly check and maintain the machineries to ensure smooth operation.
meanings.sent2: The machineries of the engine needed to be replaced due to wear and tear.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat somehow managed to get tangled in the machineries, causing a temporary halt in production.
meanings.sent4: The machineries of the clock worked together like a well-oiled team, ticking away the seconds.
meanings.sent5: The intricate machineries of the robot moved with precision and grace.
